titles.title: Data associated with GLOSS-II, The Chemical Composition of Subducting Sediments

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: Geochemical composition of subducting sediments as bulk input flux to trenches. Data is integrated and averaged over large sections of the seafloor from subduction areas, linking sediment input with arc volcanic output.
GLOSS, GLOSS-II, sediment geochemistry, subduction, mass flux, volcanic arcs, subduction zones, geochemical mass balance, trenches

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: Hikurangi, Kermadec, Tonga, Vanuatu, E.Sunda, Java, Sumatra, Andaman, Makran, Philippine, Ryukyu, Nankai, Marianas, Marianas, Izu-Bonin, Honshu, Kuriles, Kamchatka, Aleutians, Alaska, Cascadia, Mexico, Guatemala, Costa Rica, Colombia, Peru, N.Chile, C. Chile, S. Chile, Sandwich, N. Antilles,S. Antilles
